data.name: 06-【非必须品】逝3+逝外400元充值
data.detailed_description:
Purchasing this DLC will have the following effects:
1. Add 8000 extra Color Eggs in the two games of "Lost Memories 3" and "Lost Memories 3 Side Stories", which can be used for consumption in the game mall or church donation. "Lost Memories 3 Side Stories" support both Chinese and English,BUT "Lost Memories 3" DOESN'T SUPPORT ENGLISH.
2. Any time you open a lap or restart the game, you will gain an additional 8000 Color Eggs in the above two games, which can be stacked with other DLC, and will never expire.
3. Create a beautiful card in the DLC folder to indicate that you have purchased and installed this DLC.
4.The Color Eggs it provides are enough to buy "Super Tower Of Babel" form Officer Slime. "Super Tower Of Babel" can directly open the third lap of "Lost Memories 3", and then return all Color Eggs.

data.short_description: This DLC will bring you 8000 Color-Eggs extra if installed. "Lost Memories 3 Side Stories" support both Chinese and English, BUT "Lost Memories 3" DOESN'T SUPPORT ENGLISH.

fullgame.name: 逝去的回忆3：四叶草之梦

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
